t: Defy Bags Archives
s: US manufacturing is not dead. This brand defies that. It’s mantra: “Defy or Die.” Out to make itself an American classic and icon, DEFY MFG. CO. has been handcrafting its own backpacks, messengers, work cases, and travel and sports bags in Chicago, Illinois since 2008.

t: Road Tests :: DEFY BAGS Recon Messenger - Carryology
s: September 30, 2024 - It’s here, the Road Test review of the DEFY BAGS Recon Messenger (“Recon Wide” on their site), priced at $322 (Carryology readers, check at the bottom for a code good for 10% off anything on the Defy Bags site). Before we dive in, lets talk about Chris Tag and Defy Bags.

t: 5 Minutes w/Defy Bags - Carryology
s: October 24, 2024 - A new post in our ‘5 Minutes With’ series, we get the good stuff from Chris Tag, founder of Defy Bags. We’ve done a road test on the Defy Recon which you might be keen to check out if you haven’t already, since we think this brand is pretty darn rad.
